channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Aides Solicit Ideas to Raise Birthrate, From Baby Bonuses to Fertility Planning
item.description: The White House is soliciting policy proposals designed to give women incentives to have more children, a priority for many social conservatives.

item.title: Tesla kicks off earnings season for Big Tech’s ‘Magnificent 7’ amid huge market cap drops spurred by ‘massive uncertainty and chaos’ from White House
item.description: Since President Trump's Jan. 20 inauguration, Big Tech stocks have been on a see-sawing ride that has eviscerated trillions of dollars in shareholder ...

item.title: Senior leaders are feeling the burden of cuts to middle management
item.description: Senior executives are shouldering more work as middle management disappears.

item.title: Pope Francis Dies at 88, and Another Hegseth Signal Chat
item.description: Plus, more stories from our newsroom.

item.title: Remembering Pope Francis
item.description: The pontiff has died at 88. We look at his life and his influence on more than one billion Catholics.

item.title: Only 1,370 Days to Go
item.description: This is giving the people what they want?

item.title: Executives are drowning. Blame the vanishing middle management layer
item.description: Senior executives are feeling overwhelmed as they absorb more direct reports and tasks once held by middle management.

item.title: Secondhand stores selling tariff-free goods are poised to be big winners from President Trump’s trade war
item.description: American styles carry international influence, but nearly all of the clothing sold domestically is made elsewhere.

item.title: Pope Francis changed the plans for his own funeral before his death. Here’s what to expect
item.description: Funeral rites are different this time around.

item.title: Pope Francis Celebrated Easter and Met With JD Vance the Day Before He Died
item.description: The pontiff met with Vice President JD Vance on Sunday and blessed Catholics gathered for Easter. His doctors had urged him to rest.

item.title: A Timeline of the Life of Pope Francis
item.description: Francis was a deeply religious child in Buenos Aires. The first pontiff from Latin America tried to create a more welcoming church.

item.title: The Legacy of Pope Francis
item.description: Pope Francis passed away after leading the Roman Catholic Church for 12 years. His supporters remembered the first Latin American pontiff for his incl...

item.title: Pope Francis’ Life in Photos
item.description: Selected photographs from the life and papacy of Pope Francis.

item.title: Latest Updates: Pope Francis Dies at 88
item.description: His groundbreaking pontificate worked to make the Catholic Church more inclusive. Cardinals will now decide whether to continue his approach or restor...

item.title: Markets Slump on Persistent Concern That Tariffs Will Hurt Growth
item.description: Trump’s tariffs and threats against the Federal Reserve continued to jar investors on Monday as stocks, oil and the U.S. dollar all weakened. Gold set...
